Description: Fragment of foot stem and floor of Chian pottery cup, presumably with everted rim; white slip save on interior of stem; interior glazed streaky brown; exterior: glazed streaky brown; stand surface once slipped with glaze band around outside; inscription inside stem.
Curator's comments: The number 443 is written in pencil on the underside of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 443)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (East Greek 200)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1904) (phase 2)
Williams 2006a / The Chian Pottery from Naukratis (p. 132 note 63)
